subject: Question about customs fees
description_text:
Hello, I'm planning to buy the Simsonn Plus X P2-H2. They cost  $169.00 and
the shipping cost for my location in France is $9.90. That brings the total
to $178.90 or 154.11€.
If I understand correctly what is said in your help section, for an order
value less than 150€ shipped in the EU, there is no additional customs
fees.
As such, do you think it would be possible to get a 5% discount code, or
one that brings the order value just below 150€ to avoid potential
additional fees?

conversations.body_text: Hi clem04,    Please rest assured, we shall dispatch your order from our German warehouse, and no taxes will be incurred. Additionally, the two-piece black pedal set is currently out of stock at our German warehouse and will only be available for dispatch by the end of the month. You may wish to consider the silver or black three-piece pedal set instead.

Thanks for your reply. Is the two piece silver pedal set also out of stock ?

On Wed, 22 Oct 2025 at 00:57, support@simsonn.com
The silver version is in stock at our German warehouse.
